props.name: autofocus
props.description: Sets the focus on this field when the form loads. Only the first field with this label gets

props.name: disabled
props.description: Dims the tag and hides the remove button

props.name: name
props.description: A unique name for the input

props.name: required
props.description: If `true`, the field has to be filled in correctly to be submitted

props.name: ignore
props.description: Which terms to ignore when showing the create button

props.name: max
props.description: The maximum number of accepted tags

props.name: min
props.description: The minimum number of required tags

props.name: search
props.description: Whether to show the search input

props.name: html
props.description:
If set to `true`, the `text` is rendered as HTML code,
otherwise as plain text

props.name: element
props.description: HTML element to use for each tag

props.name: layout
props.description:
You can set the layout to `"list"` to extend the width of each tag
to 100% and show them in a list. This is handy in narrow columns
or when a list is a more appropriate design choice for the input
in general.

props.name: sort
props.description: Whether to sort the tags by the available options

slots.name: default
slots.description: Place stuff here in the non-draggable footer

slots.name: image
slots.description: Replaces the image/icon frame created via the `image` prop
